INVESTIGATION NOTES:
This DEPARTMENT ORDER is issues as a result of an inspection on the above referenced site.
The following violations were revealed:
You are hereby ordered to have the installation corrected to conform to the indicated provisions of the Wisconsin Administrative Code and/or Wisconsin Statuses. This installation shall be corrected by the compliance date noted, and upon correction of violations I must be notified. If you fail to comply, this order is enforceable in circuit court pursuant to s. 101.02(13), Stats., with forfeitures ranging from $10 to $100 per day for each violation.
If you have any questions regarding this matter, please feel free to contact me at the number listed below.
SPS 303.03 Permits any person affected by a rule of the department to petition for a variance of the rule. The petition needs to establish equivalency to the rule, be provided on the form from the department and be submitted with accompanying fee and municipal recommendation.
Ch. 101.02(6)(e) stats. Any employer or other person interested either because of ownership in or occupation of any property affected by any such order, or otherwise, may petition for a hearing on the reasonableness of any order of the department in the manner provided in this subchapter.
